title.value: Урожайность и качество продукции льна масличного при обработке семян комплексонатами микроэлементов
Productivity and quality of produce of oil flax with the treatment of seeds by complexonates of microelements

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Golub, I.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Flax
Dem'yanov, Eh.M., Vitebsk Oblast Executive Committee (Belarus)

abstract.value: We have presented materials about the application of complexonates of microelements and growth regulators for the cultivation of oil flax. We have established that the treatment of seeds with complexonates of microelements and plant growth regulators ecosil and rostin increase productivity of seeds, the content of oil in them and output of oil from one hectare. The treatment of oil flax seeds with complexonates of micro-fertilizers in combination with plant growth regulators increases the content of oil in seeds by 0.6–2.1 %, and the output of oil from one hectare -- by 0.027–0.101 t/ha.
